ui-icon.description: Material icons are delightful, beautifully crafted symbols for common actions and items.

ui-button.description: Buttons allow users to take actions, and make choices, with a single tap.

ui-fab.description: A floating action button (FAB) represents the primary action of a screen.

ui-icon-button.description: Icon buttons (Toggle buttons) allow users to take actions, and make choices, with a single tap.

ui-segmented-buttons.description: Segmented buttons allow users to toggle the selected states of grouped buttons.

ui-top-app-bar.description: The top app bar displays information and actions relating to the current screen.

ui-grid.description: Material designâ€™s responsive UI is based on a column-variate grid layout. It has 12 columns on desktop, 8 columns on tablet and 4 columns on phone.

ui-divider.description: A divider is a thin line that groups content in lists and layouts.

ui-drawer.description: Navigation drawers provide access to destinations in your app.

ui-drawer-header.description: Non-scrollable element that exists at the top of the drawer.

ui-drawer-title.description: Title text element of the drawer.

ui-drawer-subtitle.description: Subtitle text element of the drawer.

ui-drawer-content.description: Scrollable content area of the drawer.

ui-drawer-app-content.description: Mandatory for <ui-drawer type="dismissible"> only. Sibling element that is resized when the drawer opens/closes.

ui-tab-indicator.description: Contains the custom tab indicator content.

ui-tab-scroller.description: Contains the custom tab scroller content.

ui-menu-anchor.description: Used to indicate which element the menu should be anchored to.

ui-menu.description: Menus display a list of choices on temporary surfaces.

ui-menuitem-icon.description: Required when using a <ui-menuitem nested> to indicate which item is selected. Should contain an icon or svg that indicates the selected state of the <ui-menuitem>.

ui-pagination.description: Pagination controls provide swift access to all pages while indicating that more pages exist.

ui-textfield.description: Text fields let users enter and edit text.

ui-textfield-helper.description: Styles the container of helper text and character counter elements.
